name: Breakout Invaders (itch) (ThakaInsaan, Joe Sujin)
description:
Please play it in full screen or download the ZIP for the best experience

Destroy the pink invaders , defend your walls. You can bounce off them but they can only be hurt through explosions and lasers! 

Controls:

  • A/D or Left/Right Arrow to Move Paddles
  • Space to Split the Cell (and explode)
  • Charge both cells (with the paddle) to activate the laser
  • Fuse cells by colliding them  (and big explode)

Made in 48h for GMTK 2021 Jam by Amar and Joe.

Everything except the sound effects were made during the jam.
